f66r.description: Indexed Currier B text with margin annotation system - unique format

paragraph_labels.description: Vertical column of short tokens marking paragraph positions
paragraph_labels.visual_note: One token every 2-3 lines, approximately where paragraphs begin in main text

line_markers.encoding: Mostly single characters, approximately one per line
line_markers.description: Vertical column of single characters serving as line markers/labels
line_markers.visual_note: Some lines have two markers, alignment is approximate not perfect

main_text.description: Standard Currier B vocabulary in ring/non-paragraph layout

visual_notes: NOT a circular/ring diagram despite R placement code
Three vertical columns: L-placement (tokens) | M-placement (single chars) | R-placement (main text)
Main text to the right looks like typical Currier B
Transcribers used R placement for main text because it's not standard paragraph flow

transcript_encoding_notes.R_placement: Used for main text body - not literally ring-shaped, just non-paragraph layout
transcript_encoding_notes.L_placement: Short token paragraph markers in leftmost column
transcript_encoding_notes.no_P_placement: No standard paragraph (P) placement on this folio

user_observations: Vertical column of tokens (L-placement) on left
Vertical column of single characters (M-placement) next to it
Main text (R-placement) to the right looks like normal Currier B
Token column markers appear every 2-3 lines, roughly aligned with paragraph starts
Single char column has approximately one marker per line, some lines have two
Alignment is approximate, not perfectly grid-like

oddities.description: Unique margin annotation system with both paragraph-level (L) and line-level (M) markers
Zero P-placement tokens despite being Currier B text - all main text encoded as R
74.3% vocabulary overlap with Currier B despite unusual layout - this IS B content
L-placement tokens (rary, rals, qor, etc.) have unusual patterns - may be abbreviated labels or cross-references
No other folio in the manuscript has this indexed text format

analysis_implications.include_in_B_analysis: YES - R-placement tokens (297) should be included in Currier B analysis
analysis_implications.exclude_from_B_analysis: L-placement (15) and M-placement (34) margin labels should be excluded
analysis_implications.section_membership: Part of PHARMA section by folio number (f57-f67) but unique format
analysis_implications.not_a_diagram: Despite R-placement code, this is not a circular diagram like AZC folios
